title: Oh great, here comes 6G
summary: 6G standard establishment will be a major topic at Mobile World Congress 2026 in Barcelona. Like previous wireless standards, 6G will likely follow 5G's pattern of incremental improvements rather than delivering immediate revolutionary changes to daily life.
content:
It’s like 5G, but one more. | Image: Cath Virginia / The Verge, Getty Images	

It brings me no pleasure to say this, but friends: The next G cometh. 
The standard formally known as 6G is still being established, but it's going to be a major topic of discussion at Mobile World Congress 2026, which gets started today in Barcelona. 
5G arrived back in 2019, but also, did it, entirely? You may have noticed a distinct lack of the robot surgeons and streets dominated by autonomous vehicles that standard was supposed to enable in your daily life. Like the Gs that arrived before, 5G continues to evolve through new "releases" every few years - a case of incremental progress that couldn't possibly live up to all that hype. Tha …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.summary: 6G标准的制定将是2026年巴塞罗那移动世界大会的重要议题。与之前的无线标准一样，6G可能会遵循5G的渐进式改进模式，而不是为日常生活带来立竿见影的革命性变化。

fr.title: Oh là là, voici la 6G
fr.summary: L'établissement de la norme 6G sera un sujet majeur au Mobile World Congress 2026 à Barcelone. Comme les normes sans fil précédentes, la 6G suivra probablement le modèle d'améliorations progressives de la 5G plutôt que d'apporter des changements révolutionnaires immédiats à la vie quotidienne.

de.title: Oh je, da kommt die 6G
de.summary: Die Etablierung des 6G-Standards wird ein Hauptthema auf der Mobile World Congress 2026 in Barcelona sein. Wie frühere drahtlose Standards wird 6G wahrscheinlich dem Muster inkrementeller Verbesserungen von 5G folgen, anstatt sofortige revolutionäre Veränderungen im täglichen Leben zu bringen.

es.title: Oh no, aquí viene 6G
es.summary: El establecimiento del estándar 6G será un tema importante en el Mobile World Congress 2026 en Barcelona. Como los estándares inalámbricos anteriores, es probable que 6G siga el patrón de mejoras incrementales de 5G en lugar de traer cambios revolucionarios inmediatos a la vida cotidiana.

title: Tecno’s latest concept phone is lit by neon
summary: Tecno unveiled two concept smartphone designs featuring innovative finishes. The Pova Neon includes genuine ionized gas neon lighting for a glowing effect, while the AI EInk model uses color-changing electronic ink adjustable via the phone's camera.
content:
The Neon supposedly includes actual neon lighting in the rear. | Image: Tecno	

After teasing a magnetic, modular smartphone concept the other day, Tecno has followed that up with another two phone designs centered around color-changing finishes: one with E Ink, and the other incorporating neon.
I'm the most taken with the Pova Neon, which the company says includes genuine neon lighting, not just bright colors: it uses "ionized inert gas lighting technology" to create a glowing effect.
By contrast the AI EInk builds color electronic ink into the rear of the phone, allowing you to change the phone's color on the fly. Perhaps more impressively, you're able to set the color using the camera, so you could make your phone  …

summary: AMD is bringing its Ryzen AI processors to standard desktop PCs for the first time. The first wave targets business PCs rather than consumer DIY builders, bringing on-device AI capabilities to a broader market.
content: First wave of Ryzen AI desktop CPUs targets business PCs rather than DIYers.

title: Vivo’s next phone will launch with a professional camera rig
summary: Vivo revealed its flagship X300 Ultra smartphone at Mobile World Congress, featuring a 200-megapixel telephoto camera and professional camera accessories. The model will be the first Ultra in the series to launch globally outside China.
content:
Look closely and you might spot a phone in there somewhere. | Image: Vivo	

Vivo rarely has a presence at MWC, but this year it bucked that trend in a big way, with the reveal of its next flagship phone, the X300 Ultra, alongside an upgraded telephoto extender lens and professional camera cage. The company isn't ready to launch the handset just yet - or even reveal very many of its specs - but has confirmed that whenever it does arrive, it will be the first Ultra to go on sale outside China.
The only concrete detail about the X300 Ultra itself Vivo would confirm is that it will have a 200-megapixel telephoto camera. That was true of last year's X200 Ultra too though, so we're still waiting to find out what upgrades …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: Qualcomm’s new chip is geared toward wearable AI gadgets
summary: Qualcomm announced the Snapdragon Wear Elite chip designed for AI-powered wearables including smart pendants, pins, and glasses. The chip upgrades to a 3nm process with dedicated neural processing units for developers creating consumer AI wearables.
content:
AI wearables, all the way down. | Image: Qualcomm	

Like it or not, more AI wearables may be on the horizon - or at least Qualcomm seems to think so. Today the company announced its new Snapdragon Wear Elite chip. 
At a press briefing, Qualcomm said it considers the Elite to be a "wrist plus" chip. Meaning, it won't replace the previous W5 Plus, but exist alongside it. The company said it expects the Elite will appeal to gadget makers looking to create AI wearables such as pendants, pins, and potentially display-free smart glasses. (More powerful smart glasses will likely use its AR chip.) 
On top of being upgraded to the 3nm process, the Elite chip will have an eNPU and a Hexagon NPU for A …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: The Motorola Razr Fold is shaping up to be pure flagship
summary: Motorola's upcoming Razr Fold will be a premium-tier foldable phone priced at €1,999 (roughly $2,350) with the Moto Pen Ultra stylus, launching first in Europe before coming to North America. The device features a 6,000mAh silicon-carbon battery, making it the first foldable sold in North America to use this technology. This positions the Razr Fold as a high-end competitor in the folding phone market rather than a budget alternative.
content:
It’s all starting to unfold. | Photo: Allison Johnson / The Verge	

Motorola has revealed a little more about its upcoming folding phone, and all signs point toward a premium option - not the budget-friendlier alternative the category could use. 
For starters, the Razr Fold will cost €1,999 (about $2,350) bundled with the Moto Pen Ultra. It'll go on sale first in Europe, with North America to follow "in the coming months." Motorola hasn't confirmed how much it will cost without the stylus, or what the price is in US dollars.
The Razr Fold will come with a huge 6,000mAh silicon-carbon battery, making it the first foldable sold in North America to use the technology. It's not quite the biggest battery on any …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.title: 摩托罗拉 Razr Fold 正在成为纯旗舰机型
zh.summary: 摩托罗拉即将推出的 Razr Fold 是一款高端折叠屏手机,定价 €1,999(约合 $2,350),配备 Moto Pen Ultra 手写笔,首先在欧洲推出,随后登陆北美。该设备搭载 6,000mAh 硅碳电池,成为在北美销售的首款采用该技术的折叠屏手机。这使 Razr Fold 成为折叠屏手机市场中的高端竞争者,而不是预算型替代品。

fr.title: Le Motorola Razr Fold s'annonce comme un pur flagship
fr.summary: Le prochain Razr Fold de Motorola sera un téléphone pliable haut de gamme au prix de 1 999 € (environ 2 350 $) avec le stylet Moto Pen Ultra, lancé d'abord en Europe avant d'arriver en Amérique du Nord. L'appareil dispose d'une batterie en silicium-carbone de 6 000 mAh, ce qui en ferait le premier téléphone pliable vendu en Amérique du Nord à utiliser cette technologie. Cela positionne le Razr Fold comme un concurrent haut de gamme sur le marché des téléphones pliants plutôt qu'une alternative budgétaire.

de.title: Das Motorola Razr Fold entwickelt sich zu einem echten Flaggschiff
de.summary: Das kommende Motorola Razr Fold wird ein Premium-Falttelefon zum Preis von 1.999 € (etwa 2.350 $) mit dem Moto Pen Ultra Stylus sein und zunächst in Europa eingeführt werden, bevor es nach Nordamerika kommt. Das Gerät verfügt über einen 6.000-mAh-Silizium-Kohlenstoff-Akku und ist das erste in Nordamerika verkaufte Falttelefon mit dieser Technologie. Dies positioniert das Razr Fold als hochwertige Konkurrenz auf dem Markt für faltbare Telefone und nicht als budgetfreundliche Alternative.

es.title: El Motorola Razr Fold se perfila como un puro buque insignia
es.summary: El próximo Motorola Razr Fold será un teléfono plegable de gama premium con un precio de 1.999 € (aproximadamente $2.350) con el stylus Moto Pen Ultra, lanzándose primero en Europa antes de llegar a América del Norte. El dispositivo cuenta con una batería de silicio-carbono de 6.000 mAh, lo que lo convierte en el primer teléfono plegable vendido en América del Norte que utiliza esta tecnología. Esto posiciona al Razr Fold como un competidor de gama alta en el mercado de teléfonos plegables en lugar de una alternativa presupuestaria.
